Text.Page:
I don't have the resources here, but I'll make sure Mysterium experts study that mass.

Meanwhile, I want you to find out what the argons are using to make that mist.

You should head south, because that's the direction the argons went. Find Puuru at the Arcanum Outpost.

He's no workaholic, but he'll know where to look.

Nila wants something? Big surprise. It's always urgent with her.

Nope, no argons here. You see any?

Of course, you want my help, but can it wait a minute or three?
